parameters.name: DhcpOptionsSetId
parameters.description: The ID of the DHCP options set.

parameters.name: DryRun
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to check the request without performing the operation. Valid values:

*   **true**: checks the request but does not query VPCs. The system checks whether your AccessKey pair is valid, whether the Resource Access Management (RAM) user is authorized, and whether the required parameters are set. If the request fails to pass the check, an error message is returned. If the request passes the check, the `DryRunOperation` error code is returned.
*   **false** (default): sends the request. If the request passes the check, a 2xx HTTP status code is returned and VPCs are queried.

parameters.name: IsDefault
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to query the default VPC in the specified region. Valid values:

*   **true** (default): yes
*   **false**: no

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return per page. Maximum value: **50**. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the VPC.

You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~36063~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group to which the VPC to be queried belongs.

parameters.name: VpcId
parameters.description:
The ID of the VPC.

You can specify up to 20 VPC IDs. Separate multiple IDs with commas (,).

parameters.name: VpcOwnerId
parameters.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud account to which the VPC belongs.
